plough.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a piece of farm equipment used to turn over the earth so that seeds can be planted
plough.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to turn over the earth using a plough so that seeds can be planted
plough.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: In those days the land was plowed by oxen.
plough.translation[1].definitions[1].def: to move with a lot of effort or force
plough.translation[1].definitions[1].exa: We ploughed through the thick mud.
plough.translation[2].definitions[0].def: a group of seven bright stars that can only be seen from the northern part of the world. They form part of the constellation (=group of stars) called Ursa Major, and in the US they are often called the Big Dipper.
